description: 3 Days and 2 Nights - Cochin and Munnar
details: Drive to Munnar which will take almost 4 hours travel. Check into hotel on arrival and spend the day at leisure. Overnight stay is arranged in Munnar.
Accommodation in a Standard Air-Conditioned room
Transfers from railway station/airport to hotel
Travel in an air-conditioned car as per the itinerary
Intercity transfers and sightseeing tours as per the itinerary
